content:
[{"id":"fT6uH4Ar7K","type":"header","data":{"text":"ELA","col":12}},{"id":"r9TBisLQea","type":"card","data":{"card_name":"Configuration","col":5}},{"id":"565SdPbMiN","type":"header","data":{"text":"Usage","col":12}},{"id":"BBag-QLdDV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. Create a learning cohort
2. Upload learners for each cohort
3. Create activities
4. Create assessment forms - one each for a cohort + activity
5. Export the assessment form as a file. This 'form file' will be used by the ELA Collect mobile app.
6. Transfer it to the phone device via Bluetooth (link to steps - TBC)
7.  Ensure the form file is in the location Dowload/ela/forms
8. Open the ELA Collect app (scan QR code step - TBC)
9. Click on 'Download Form'. This will load your form from the location Download/ela/form into the app
10. Click on 'Start new form' and submit forms as usual.","col":12}},{"id":"OJ9kE1HHGO","type":"header","data":{"text":"Prerequisites","col":12}},{"id":"HPBWP55naS","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. A smartphone with the ELA Collect app installed
2. A desktop computer with the ELA server app installed and pre-configured. Collect the user id and password from the administrator
3. Configure the 'ELA local' project by scanning this QR code in the ELA Collect app. This is a one-time task. DO NOT DELETE THIS PROJECT once you have started submitting forms. Otherwise you will lose all the collected data.
4. Understand key terminology - Cohort, Learner, Activity, Assessment Form, Submission, Package
","col":12}}]
label: ELA Home
name: ELA Home
title: ELA Home
